channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Public Tree/Bush - Fruit on Pavement by Bus Stop, 5th August
item.description:
The pavement by the bus stop is covered in fruits, causing mess, a slippery risk and bad odour. It would be appreciated if the bushes were pruned and the pavement cleaned. Many thanks!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southlands Grove, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned bin, 5th August
item.description:
Multiple abandoned bins of Hazel drive, directly outside 65 and located next to the park. One bin is filled with junk by people accessing the park which is the picture that I have attached.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hazel Drive, Slade Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bikes past the weeks notice, 5th August
item.description:
Please can these be removed! This is the second 1 week deadline that has been missed! These bikes have been there as long as I’ve lived here, 3 years.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brooke Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Food stall, 5th August
item.description:
Does this food stall have a license to sell food? It is in disgusting dirty state, it is blocking the pavement, it does not have a food hygiene certificate, its opposite the old Erith Snooker club , next to the car park, it has also damaged vegetation to put a barbecue behind the van, there is also some kind of liquid leaking from it onto the pavement…

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pier Road, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Maggots crawling from flytipping bag, 5th August
item.description:
Dear Southwark Council Waste Management Team, I am writing to report an ongoing issue of fly-tipping - see the attached picture, due to the hot weather maggots are crawling from the disposed rubbish - now posing a serious health hazard and negatively affecting the local environment.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Balchier Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Charlton park lane to stadium road, 5th August
item.description:
Hello, please could you send the sweepers to clean up Charlton Park Lane from Charlton Park itself until where the lane meets Stadium Road. Tonnes of very old leaves and rubbish haven’t been swept in many many weeks.the pavements where the brick wall cemetery leads into the street is dirty. Please do the needful. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charlton Park Lane, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drug dealing, 5th August
item.description:
Daily 24/7 drug dealing and ASB at top of T GREEN leading up into BOSTAL WOODS accessed off of WICKHAM LANE between BASTION ROAD and RUTHERGLEN ROAD,SE2. Residents reporting almost daily to police.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rutherglen Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Victoria Rd NW6, 5th August
item.description:
Builders have been blocking out 6/8 parking spaces with bins and building material for months on two properties being renovated. Today 5th August the street is impassable for traffic both ways due to a lorry blocking the road.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Victoria Road, London

item.title: Section of road is breaking apart again, 5th August
item.description:
The road has only been patched once when I think the whole section of this road really needs fixing it's still dangerous for cars to be driving over the damaged road it's Literally sinking in on both sides of the road and causing people's car bumper to scrape on its been like this for 3 years now

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Loughborough Park, Loughborough Junction, London
